biotools.summary: Novel succinylation site online prediction tool which is constructed to predict the lysine succinylation sites based on two major categories of characteristics: sequence-derived features and evolutionary-derived information of sequence and via an enhanced feature strategy for further optimizations.

bioschemas.name: SuccFind
bioschemas.summary: Novel succinylation site online prediction tool which is constructed to predict the lysine succinylation sites based on two major categories of characteristics: sequence-derived features and evolutionary-derived information of sequence and via an enhanced feature strategy for further optimizations.
